Welcome!

My name is Qian Kun, and this are my Portfolios and my Resume.

I'm currently a Software Engineer in the Enterprice Mobility Lab, HCL Technology , Singapore. I am lead Java/Android developer in designing and developing mobile E-Commerce, Wallet, CRM, Task Management apps for MNCs in E-commerce, Banking and Governments secters.

Before joining HCL, I co-foundered (Android/UX) a mobile social networking startup named GroupCells in 2011, you may find some intro in TechCrunch , TechNode etc.

I worked as Graduate Researcher in Human Computer Interaction (HCI) Lab, National University of Singapore, HCI Lab, University of Manitoba, Canada. I graduated with M.Sc in Computer Science/HCI in National University of Singapore, B.S in Computer Science/Machine Learning and B.B.A in Accountancy from Fudan University, China.


Skills:

Java/Android (Expert) C#/Windows8 JavaScript/jQMobile/Bootstrap/PhoneGap Objective-C/iOS Java/Play Framework Ruby on Rails JavaScript/NodeJS/Express C++ AWS/Heroku SQL/SQLite/MySQL NOSQL/MongoDB Big Data/Hadoop UX/UI Agile
